EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Americas_CorporateJetSupport_MSP_KR.201907_Amer_CJS_MSP_Email1_KR
EmailTemplate.subject: Check Out Honeywell’s New Maintenance Service Plan Program!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Introducing Maintenance Service Plan – an umbrella of offerings that incorporates the current Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP), Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) and Maintenance Protection Plan (MPP) Programs. Maintenance Service Plan is a maintenance solution that makes it easy for you to choose from a range of selectable coverage options, tailored to your platform and operations. Under the new Maintenance Service Plan umbrella, selectable options include:
New Name Old Name
Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics HAPP – Honeywell Avionics Protection Program
Maintenance Service Plan – Mechanical Components MPP - Mechanical Protection Plan
Our Maintenance Service Plan will continue to provide real value to your operations through enhanced aircraft resale value, and other benefits such as financial predictability and simplified budgeting. These benefits are intended to reduce the maintenance burden and ensure your aircraft is where it belongs – up in the sky.
If only everything in life was as easy as a Maintenance Service Plan from Honeywell! Contact Corporate Jet Support today to learn more or request a quote.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/CorporateJetSupport_MSP.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_cjs_msp&utm_term=email]]>
